channel.title: False Rape Allegations on Lyon's Field Notes
channel.description: Recent content in False Rape Allegations on Lyon's Field Notes

item.title: Feminism and false rape allegations
item.description: Jemma Beale (25) was found guilty in July in Southwark Crown Court of making a series of false allegations of serious sexual assault and rape against fifteen men over a four year period. One falsely convicted man served two years of a seven year prison sentence in 2011 after the Crown Prosecution Serviceâ€™s second attempt to secure his conviction on her behalf. Another was falsely arrested after being forced to flee the country.
